creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: landscape featuring small partitioned rice fields; farmers planting rice plants and working the land; sweeping channel with two boats and a bridge separates fields in foreground from those in middle ground; row of tall trees and huts behind fields in middle ground; Mt. Fuji in background
inscription: ULC: [Bunka Heishi Soshun / Mo Ikeno Taiga sensei no hitsui]  (13th year of Bunka(1816) early spring / copied master Ikeno Taiga\'s painting)
markings: ULC: [Denkoku];  [Shigen]; [Beisanjin]; yellow sticker L roller end: [05]; white sticker L roller end: [CJ 147]
title: Rice Paddies and Fuji, after Taiga
